description: Associates a limit with a particular queue. After the limit is associated, all workers for jobs that specify the limit associated with the queue are subject to the limit. You can't associate two limits with the same amountRequirementName to the same queue.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the farm that contains the queue and limit to associate.

parameters.name: queueId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the queue to associate with the limit.

parameters.name: limitId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the limit to associate with the queue.
